name: After 6 hours, the body is still in the same place.
description:
Based on true story of 20 July 2021 in Thailand

Occurred since the evening of July 20 ago. police officer Reportedly found dead man's body from coronavirus Ban Phan Thom alley, Samsen road, Ban Phan Thom sub-district, Phra Nakhon district, Bangkok, therefore traveled to inspect Found the body of an unknown man, about 40-50 years old (no documents with him), lying on his back, died. The deceased had no injuries from the assault. The police then used a veil and brought a rubber cone to block the area. to wait for the task force officers to collect the bodies.

From the preliminary investigation, it was found that The deceased fell when they reached the area at 10 a.m., but no one dared to help. Because the villagers in the area knew that the deceased was homeless and infected with the coronavirus. Therefore, immediately inform the relevant officers to help immediately. Until about 2 pm, rescuers wearing protective clothing came to help. By giving oxygen until about 4 p.m. the man died. Then the villagers notified various agencies. But there is no agency to collect the funeral. Until more than 6 hours later, the body remained where it was.

And there are many other events, many more lives were abandoned in this way.
